text: Tyler Baltierra is looking a bit different these days. The Teen Mom OG star has lost 26 pounds in five weeks — and is ecstatic with the result. Celebs'Weight Loss Transformations The reality star, 26, showed off his impressive weight loss with then and now pics via Instagram on Thursday, January 18. “ 6lbs DOWN!!! To be honest I didn ’ t even want to take a before picture, because I was already thinking of me not sticking with it & then having the evidence of failure to look back on. But DAYYUMM dude! ” he wrote. “ This got me feeling some type of way right now! Left picture was almost 5 weeks ago & Right picture was today, ” he continued. “ Eating health
